=== Additional elements ===
==== Chromium Scrollbars ====
Extension that replace the Chromium scrollbars with scrollbars that match Lubuntu. Free to download and very easy to installation through the <nowiki>[[https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hemkkjpjknkkndhconammdhlhdkjclim | Chrome Web Store]]</nowiki>
